entry.title: The Shortcut Library
entry.content:
• Useful hexo blog build: https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/60578464
  • OpenSSH Win2Win Issues: https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/592296884
  • hexo themes NexT: https://theme-next.js.org/
  • powershell findstr -> unix grep
  • terminal theme name: oh-my-posh, to modify theme -> directly modify the file at $PROFILE
  • vscode proxy -> settings.json -> "http.proxy", "https.proxy", "http.proxyStrictSSL"

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
